data: Use the Button component with custom styles for actions in forms, dialogs, and more, with support for multiple sizes, states, and more.
data.examples#Examples:
Primary
Secondary
Success
Danger
Warning
Info
Light
Dark
data.outline-buttons#Outline Buttons: If you need a button without the hefty background colors, use the outline prop to create an outline button.
data.examples-1#Examples:
Primary
Secondary
Success
Danger
Warning
Info
Light
Dark
data.sizes#Sizes: Fancy larger or smaller buttons? Use the size prop with lg or sm for additional sizes.
data.props#Props: Prop	Type	Default	Description	children	node	-	The content inside the button, typically text or other elements.	variant	string	'primary'	Determines the button's color scheme and styling. Available options are primary, secondary, success, danger, warning, info, light, dark, link.	outline	bool	false	Whether to show a border with text color instead of a solid background.	size	string	'medium'	Determines the button's size. Available options are small, medium, large.	className	string	''	Additional CSS classes to apply to the button for further customization.

data: The Card component offers a flexible and customizable way to display content. Below are the details of the properties and usage examples.
data.basic-card#Basic Card:
Go Somewhere
<Card
  title="Card title"
  text="Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content."
>
  <Button variant="primary" size="medium" className="mt-4">
    Go Somewhere
  </Button>
</Card>
data.card-with-header-and-footer#Card with He:
Go Somewhere
<Card
  header="Card Header"
  footer="Card Footer"
  title="Card title"
  text="Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content."
>
  <Button variant="primary" size="medium" className="mt-4">
    Go Somewhere
  </Button>
</Card>
data.text-alignment#Text alignment: Go Somewhere Go Somewhere Go Somewhere
data.props#Props: Prop	Type	Default	Description	title	string	-	The title of the card.	subtitle	string	-	The subtitle of the card.	text	string	-	The main text content of the card.	imgSrc	string	-	The URL of the image to display in the card.	imgAlt	string	'Card image cap'	The alt text for the image.	header	string	-	The content of the card's header.	footer	string	-	The content of the card's footer.	textAlign	string	'left'	The text alignment (left, center, right).	variant	string	'basic'	The style variant of the card (basic, primary, secondary, success, danger, warning).	outline	bool	false	Whether to show a border instead of a solid background.	className	string	''	Additional CSS classes for the card.	children	node	-	Additional content inside the card body.
